Title: Increases certain penalties related to endangered and threatened species
Summary: Increases certain penalties relating to endangered and special species, species of special concern and illegal ivory articles and rhinoceros horns.
LawCode: Amd ยง71-0925, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to increasing certain penalties relating to endangered and special species, species of special concern and illegal ivory articles and rhinoceros horns
